lead_paragraph: RUBEN--Lawrence. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Lawrence Ruben, beloved husband of Jan Ruben and the late Selma Ruben. Lawrence leaves behind a legacy of exceptional philanthropic commitment and a family who will carry on a tradition of Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Jan; Lawrence's children, Richard (Amy) Ruben, Lenore Ruben, and Shelly (Howard) Kivell; his grandchildren and great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Jeffrey A. Schoenfeld, President; Robert S. Kapito, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
